pkgmetadata.longdescription: Urban Centrality Index // Calculates the Urban Centrality Index (UCI) as in Pereira et al., (2013) doi:10.1111/gean.12002. The UCI measures the extent to which the spatial organization of a city or region varies from extreme polycentric to extreme monocentric in a continuous scale from 0 to 1. Values closer to 0 indicate more polycentric patterns and values closer to 1 indicate a more monocentric urban form.
